metadata.title: BlueGateX | Secure Fintech, SaaS, & Multi-Platform Solutions
metadata.description: UK-based software company specializing in financial technology, multi-platform apps, and SaaS systems for startups and enterprises.

hero.headline: Build. Launch. Scale. Secure Fintech & SaaS products that empower businesses worldwide.
hero.subtext: BlueGateX Ltd is a UK-based software company specialized in financial technology, multi-platform apps, and SaaS systems. We design and develop secure payment platforms, digital wallets, open banking APIs, and scalable business software for startups and enterprises.
hero.tagline: We build apps that move markets.

about.title: Who We Are
about.mission: At BlueGateX, we believe technology should simplify finance — not complicate it.
about.description: Our mission is to create secure, accessible, and intelligent digital solutions for the next generation of financial and SaaS innovation. From Flutter mobile apps to AI-driven web dashboards and open-banking integrations, we deliver end-to-end products with real business impact.
about.location: Based in Bradford, United Kingdom — serving Europe & the MENA region.
